text: Don't Make Waves is a 1967 American romantic comedy movie directed by Alexander Mackendrick and was based on the 1959 novel Muscle Beach by Ira Wallach. It stars Tony Curtis, Sharon Tate, Robert Webber, Joanna Barnes, David Draper, Claudia Cardinale, Sarah Selby, Julie Payne, Chester Yorton and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Mackendrick
title: Don't Make Waves
